This was my first Counter-Strike game I ever played, and it's the best in my opinion.
You can run it on anything, good servers (even though there are mostly russian servers), and not much cheaters.
Veƒæmi dobra hra na hranie s priateƒæmi. ale pozor vysoko n√°vykov√©.

As a CS Main Player: 
I Always Love CSS more than All Counter Strike Games.
Realistic And Beautiful Physics And Awesome Graphics With Source Engine. 
It May Be Old Now, But It Was great In Its Day.
Recommend This Game. 10/10

English and Russian versions.

Wake up... wake up mister Gordon FreeValve. FreeValve, do your homework. You should have done it 10 years ago. Fix the achievements for CS GO (give back all maps (Aztec, Dust, Shorttrain) that you have deleted from the game, everyone can find the best map for himself) and CS Source (Gift Grab). User: Mister Gordon FreeValve, I have only one question for you. Quality is empty place for you? Gordon FreeValve: Yes, mister User. User: Do you know that without quality, it is the way to nowhere? Gordon FreeValve: Sure we know that and we keep doing everything to reach this endpoint.

About the game:

The very good game. Didn't meet any bugs. The game engine gives us the very good picture. Physics in the game done on highest level.

It‚Äôs like CSGO but worse, the graphics look old, and the player base is either a 40 y/o neckbeard named Dennis, or a 9 y/o screeching at you the entire time. 9/10 good game

A classic
Best Counter-Strike there is

I have many memories of playing a pirated copy of Source as a kid, coming back to it again in early 2022 I'm happy to say it holds up, and with custom sprays and community servers.
And I don't think it's nostalgia talking, but I genuinely have more fun playing source than any other counter strike at this point.
